question: eating of kidney and testicles of HALA animal after ZIBAH of this animal
answer:
QUESTION

I want to ask about the eating of kidney and testicles of HALA animal after ZIBAH of this animal. Is it Hallal or Haram or Makrooh of eating these parts?

ANSWER


Share:

It is permissible to eat the kidney of halaal animals that are slaughtered according to the Islamic Laws of Zabah (slaughter). It is not permissible to eat the testicles of any animal (Bahr vol.1 Pg 354).

And Allah Knows Best

Muhammed Zakariyya Desai
